EmailTemplate.textOnly: How does NCR bridge the gap between online and in-store customer experiences? Consider this: Northgate Market was able to launch Pronto! Curbside by leveraging NCR Freshop, bringing convenience and contactless shopping to its customers. Through Pronto! Curbside, orders can be placed and loaded contactless into cars in less than two hours.
